name: glut
description: OpenGL Utility Toolkit (FreeGLUT) - 3D shapes, text rendering, and the famous Utah Teapot

macos.note: FreeGLUT provides better cross-platform compatibility than deprecated GLUT.framework

notes: Uses FreeGLUT (open-source GLUT) with pkg-config for universal cross-platform support. FreeGLUT pkg-config handles all linking automatically.
